Water.Description: Water is used to generate electricity through the process of hydroelectric power.
Water quality and availability are negatively impacted by water pollution.
Water conservation practices help in preserving water resources and maintaining its sustainability.
Water is an essential component of the water cycle, which is responsible for the continuous circulation of water on Earth.
